nodes.text: Makem Te was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that was the homeworld of the Swokes Swokes species. It was located close to one end of the Perlemian Trade Route, which connected it to the planets Quermia and Desevro.

Makem Te was first mentioned in the novelization of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, which was written by Terry Brooks and released in 1999. It was first mentioned in canon in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a roleplaying game released by Fantasy Flight Games on August 4, 2016.
